author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: Chinese economy shrinks for first time as Wuhan death toll rises
description: China’s economy shrank 6.8 per cent in the three months of 2020, the country’s first such contraction on record and a stark sign of the financial impact of the coronavirus pandemic. The news came as Chinese authorities revised the death toll in Wuhan, the har…
content:
Chinas economy shrank 6.8 per cent in the three months of 2020, the countrys first such contraction on record and a stark sign of the financial impact of the coronavirus pandemic.
